scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "npm build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
